questions: how do I update my profile
faqs.response:
Here's how to update your property details:

1. Sign in to the app
2. Select the Profile tab at the bottom right-hand side of the screen
3. Under the Property section, select Property Information
4. Here you can:
   - Add special instructions for your Pro
   - Specify access issues
   - Define the area to be serviced

questions: how do I cancel my lawn treatment
faqs.response:
Your tailored Lawn Treatment service is designed to work as a comprehensive package of 7-8 applications - you'll get the best results if the applications are applied as intended. However, you are free to cancel anytime. You are never charged until after the service is completed.

Important: If you do not cancel or reschedule a service date at least 48 hours prior to the scheduled time, you will be charged the full amount for the canceled or rescheduled service.

questions: how do I prepare my lawn
what should I do before treatment
faqs.response:
To prepare your lawn for treatment:

1. Remove leaves, sticks, or any debris that might block the treatment
2. Water your lawn lightly the day before
3. Ensure the soil is moist but not soaked

Our products are guaranteed safe and eco-friendly:

- All products are EPA registered
- Following rigorous selection process
- Safe for families and pets

Recommendation: Allow the application to dry for 1-2 hours before families and pets resume enjoying their lawns.

First Service Timeline:

- Initial treatment occurs within 3 weeks from order date
- Provider will assess your lawn's needs
- Additional services scheduled 4-6 weeks apart
- Check in-app for next service schedule

questions: can I pause my mowing service
faqs.response:
Yes! To pause your lawn mowing service:

1. Go to the Service tab list
2. Find your lawn mowing service
3. Select 'Pause for the season' at the bottom of the screen

You can also cancel your service from the same location.

To update your payment information:

1. Go to Profile
2. Select Payment Method
3. You'll see your current payment method with last 4 digits and expiration date
4. Click 'Update Payment Method' to add a new card

Yes! To reschedule your lawn mowing service:

1. Find your service in the Service tab list
2. Select it
3. Use the rescheduling options at the bottom of the service details screen
4. Choose to skip your next service or reschedule for a different day

questions: what time will my pro arrive
faqs.response: Your pro will arrive on the day of your scheduled service. For a precise arrival time, use the Inbox to send a message to your pro.

questions: what is the long grass fee policy
why am I being charged a long grass fee
why do I need to pay more for long grass
faqs.response:
The Long Grass Fee policy compensates our Pros for the extra time and equipment strain when mowing taller grass. Here's how it works:

For grass 9-15 inches tall:
- 50% additional fee if only part of the yard is affected
- 100% additional fee if most of the yard is affected

For grass over 15 inches:
1. You'll receive a notification via email and SMS
2. You must approve the fee before mowing can proceed
3. You'll see available return dates in the Long Grass Fee Report
4. Select your preferred return date
5. The Pro will be notified once you accept

Important Notes:
- The fee will expire the day before the Pro's last available return date
- If you reject the fee, our customer support will contact you
- When rejecting, please explain your reason and preferred solution

This policy helps ensure efficient service and fair compensation for our Pros while maintaining equipment integrity.
